Source code for havoc.autoval.lib.host.system.models.yosemitev2

from __future__ import absolute_import
from __future__ import division
from __future__ import print_function
from __future__ import unicode_literals

from havoc.autoval.lib.host.models.openbmc_yosemitev2 import OpenBMCYosemiteV2
from havoc.autoval.lib.host.system.system import System
from havoc.autoval.lib.host.system.bios.models.yosemite_v2_bios import YosemiteV2Bios
from havoc.autotest_testfiles.validation_utils.lib.autoval_exceptions import TestError



[docs]class YosemiteV2(System):

[docs]    def __init__(self, host):
        super(YosemiteV2, self).__init__(host)
        self.product_name = "Yosemite V2"
        self.bios = YosemiteV2Bios(host)
        self.bmc = OpenBMCYosemiteV2
        self.product_type_glacierpoint = "Glacier Point V2"
        self.product_type_northdome = "North Dome EVT"



[docs]    def check_project_type(self, fru_details):
        if self.product_name in fru_details:
            # Check for NorthDome
            if self.product_type_northdome in fru_details or \
                    self.product_type_glacierpoint in fru_details:
                return False
            # Adding a additional check to find out if the host has
            # glacier point connected to it
            cmd = "lspci|grep -i 'PCI bridge: PMC-Sierra'"
            ret = self.connection.run(cmd, get_result_obj=True, ignore_status=True)
            if ret.return_code == 0:
                return False
            return True



[docs]    def inject_ierr_caterr(self):
        # Inject an IERR CATERR
        try:
            base_cmd = "ipmitool raw 0x0a 0x44 0 0 2 0 0 0 0 0x40 0x00"
            cmd = base_cmd + " " + "0x04 0x07 0xeb 0x6f 0x00 0xff 0xff"
            self.connection.run(cmd)
        except Exception as e:
            raise TestError("IERR CATEER cmd failed: %s" % str(e))
        return



[docs]    def inject_mcerr_caterr(self):
        # Inject a MCERR CATERR
        try:
            base_cmd = "ipmitool raw 0x0a 0x44 0 0 2 0 0 0 0 0x40 0x00"
            cmd = base_cmd + " " + "0x04 0x07 0xeb 0x6f 0x0b 0xff 0xff"
            self.connection.run(cmd)
        except Exception as e:
            raise TestError("MCERR CATEER cmd failed: %s" % str(e))
        return
